name: Dodgy Rocket DEMO
description:
Hi, this is game I made for fun in 3 days because I was bored. I am really happy that I managed to finish a small game in very short time. I am planning to later on, after I add a lot more thing release it as a full game (still on itch, and probably for free). Hope you enjoy!

And don't rage. It's hard.

Controls: A and D to move (unfortunately for old-school gamers, you can't use arrow keys. I'll probably put it later on)

Don't ask me why you have 7 lives. I just like that number (actually because I was debugging some code, and my highscore was too high for me to beat it with just 5 lives, so I made it be 7. And I forgot to bring it back to 5).

If you like the  game, maybe consider donating a bit.
